title: 美國眾議員賴特：NBA屈服於中國的要求，會消滅美國人和爭取自由的香港抗爭者的聲音

replies.msg:
China is attempting to control our freedom of speech here in the United States by threatening business deals with the @NBA.

By giving in to these demands, the @NBA is silencing Americans, as well as all the protesters fighting for freedom in #HongKong.

https://twitter.com/RepRonWright/status/1181295814813069313?s=09
